name: 912b10fd-78c2-5035-8e5f-ca4b9c0491f7
notes: This service provides nephelometer measurements of volume scattering coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles observed at Zugspitze-Schneefernerhaus, Germany (20100303 - 20151231). The observations contain level 2 data. The time resolution is 1h. The observations are stored in the EBAS database (http://ebas.nilu.no/).
title: Measurements of volume scattering coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles at Zugspitze-Schneefernerhaus, Germany (20100303 - 20151231)
